summary: E-commerce application with admin dashboard, user authentication, and product/category management system
architectural_notes: Frontend connects to backend canisters for products and categories data
Dashboard displays product and category statistics
Home page includes 'Featured Products' and 'Shop by Category' sections
known_issues: Products and categories not displaying (showing 0 items)
Database tables may be empty or disconnected from frontend

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify and fix the data fetching for products in the backend main.mo getProducts() method to ensure it returns all stored products from the products HashMap
Verify and fix the data fetching for categories in the backend main.mo getCategories() method to ensure it returns all stored categories from the categories HashMap
If the products HashMap is empty, populate it with sample products including at least one product in the 'Mobiles' category with realistic data (name, description, price, stock, imageUrl)
If the categories HashMap is empty, populate it with sample categories including 'Mobiles' and at least 2-3 other relevant e-commerce categories (e.g., 'Electronics', 'Fashion', 'Home & Kitchen')
Ensure the HomePage's Featured Products section (first 8 products) successfully fetches and displays products using the useGetProducts hook
Ensure the HomePage's Shop by Category section successfully fetches and displays all categories using the useGetCategories hook

projectName: Restore product and category data display
